title: ICEYE launches pilot flood scheme with If P&C Insurance
key_assets: proprietary synthetic aperture radar (SAR) satellite constellation
summary: ICEYE has entered a pilot scheme with If P&C Insurance to provide its Flood Insights product, leveraging ICEYE’s SAR satellite constellation to deliver rapid flood data and insights. The partnership aims to enhance If P&C Insurance’s claims handling processes for flood-related losses and improve customer response during flood events.
why_it_matters: This partnership demonstrates the growing integration of space-based data solutions in the insurance industry, particularly for natural catastrophe response. It highlights ICEYE’s role as a key provider of actionable SAR data for risk assessment and claims management, potentially setting a precedent for similar collaborations in the sector.

entities.name: Tuomas Räikkönen
entities.role: Head of Large & International Claims, If P&C Insurance
